plugins.name: kuku-pr-review-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents specializing in comments, tests, error handling, type design, code quality, security vulnerabilities, and code simplification. All agents support LSP and Serena symbolic tools for precise code analysis.

plugins.name: kuku-doc-consistency-toolkit
plugins.description: Document consistency checking agents for verifying alignment between OpenSpec specifications, top-level architecture design, detailed design documents, and code implementation. All agents support LSP and Serena symbolic tools for precise code analysis.
